data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Dear Maria,
I'm ____ to ____ if ____ would ____ willing ____ throw a party ____ me. It's ____ birthday ____ week, and I'd appreciate ____ you ____ arrange ____ event ____ a ____ restaurant. You don't have ____ do ____, ____ call ____ make a reservation ____ then ____ some ____. You don't even have to bake a cake!
data.partBlankContent:
Dear Maria,
I'm wri____ to a__ if y__ would b_ willing t_ throw a party f__ me. It's m_ birthday ne__ week, and I'd appreciate i_ you co___ arrange a_ event a_ a lo___ restaurant. You don't have t_ do mu__, ju__ call a__ make a reservation a__ then inv___ some gue___. You don't even have to bake a cake!
data.fullContent: Dear Maria, I'm writing to ask if you would be willing to throw a party for me. It's my birthday next week, and I'd appreciate if you could arrange an event at a local restaurant. You don't have to do much, just call and make a reservation and then invite some guests. You don't even have to bake a cake!
data.answer: 亲爱的玛丽亚, 我写信是想问你是否愿意为我举办一个聚会。下周是我的生日，如果你能在当地餐馆安排一次活动，我将不胜感激。你不需要做很多事情，只需要打个电话预订，然后邀请一些客人。你甚至不需要烤蛋糕！
